problems.title: Loss of Suction / Filter Alarm
solution_steps: Use the automatic pre-filter cleaning tool included with the vacuum.

problems.title: Battery Dies Quickly
solution_steps: The S11 has a detachable battery. Swap it out.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the filter on a Pure One S11 Cordless Stick?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement filter typically costs significantly less than a new $380 vacuum, and extending the life of your Tineco is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Pure One S11 Cordless Stick needs a new filter?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the filter on my Pure One S11 Cordless Stick myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
